ygData.subject: Is Anybody at the ark other than us?
ygData.msgSnippet: Lunarpine transformed back to his wolf form, all scan With that one command his senses took over. He saw tracks that didn t appear otherwise, he smelled the

Subject: Is Anybody at the ark other than us?

Lunarpine transformed back to his wolf form, "all scan" With that one 
command his senses took over. He saw tracks that didn't appear 
otherwise, he smelled the air, they weren't alone, but he still 
wasn't sure if it was the naitive animals he smelled or if trouble 
was still near.

He activated his comm, "Anything on your end S Wing?" he knew in this 
situation there wasn't time for full names.

Until he was sure of his senses he couldn't be relied on. Slowly he 
backed toward the entrance of the Ark, hoping the autoguns were 
offline.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Logo morph" <logomorph@h...> 
wrote:
> ::Shadow Wing::
> 
> She noticed that something was different about the place.
> "Huh? Oh yeah. I'll go on ahead."
> She transformed into her owl mode and flew up ahead.  She spotted 
the Ark.  
> She couldn't beieve her optics.  The Ark was missing part of it's 
structure. 
>   A huge hole had been blow out on the side of the Ark.  The ground 
all 
> around was charred.  Mech fluid on the ground in patches 
everywhere.  "What 
> happened here?"
> She flew in for a closer look. A large battle had taken place. She 
hoped 
> that the Maximals survived.  The Autoguns  did not fire on her as 
she flew 
> into the entrance.  She stopped just inside the door way and 
transformed 
> into bot mode.  She took a few steps and drew her gun.  She slowly 
walked 
> down the hallway. She kept out of sight incase someone other than 
Maximal 
> walked by.
> 
> 
> ---Orginal Message---
> From:   <cyberwolf4@p...>
> Date: Fri Jun 30, 2000 10:19pm
> Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
> 
> 
> The sights,filled his optics, the sounds were all around him, 
echoing
> through the trees. The smells of animals he had yet to encounter, 
but
> seemed familiar.He assumed these were the Maximals. He caught traces
> of burnt trees, and chared earth from thier previous battles, but
> somehow the wildlife didn't seem affected.
> 
> "I smell something out of the ordinary."
> 
> He didn't know ordinary but he knew what he smelled didn't belong.
> 
> How far till we're at the Ark? maybe you should call ahead to be 
sure.
> 
> 
> 
>
